bboxes.raw_text:
NEW YORK = Contrary to pop
ular belief, the vast ma jority of
Americas poor are neither black
nor living in depressed areas
like Harlem or Applachia.
These forgotten" poor are the
five million invisible white
families who live hidden In city
slums.


In the current issue of LOOK
Maya zine, Michael Harrington,
author Of the best-selling book,
"The Other America" says that
of the 9.3 million families cited
by President Johnson as poor,
70 per cent are white.


A family with an annual income
below $4,000 is categorized by
the President as poor. Also
debunked were other popular

myths concerning the nations
poor.


Harrington finds that: (l) The
poor generally are not poor be-
cause they are lazy; they have
their pride and work hard, but
continue to get poorer. (2) A
regular salary doesn't wipe away
poverty; many heads of families
would be better off by not working
and accepting welfare checks, he
says.


Harrington, in his Look article,
says that help of sorts is on the
way. He adds:


with President Johnson's
declaration of war on poverty,
IS million Americans have begun
to emerge from social
anonymity"

Look Article Says Whites
Are More Poverty Stricken

S/Sgt. Boudreaux Lester, Jr.,
of Luke Air Force Base, has
started one man campaign to
raise funds to help clothe some
needy children for school. He
will collect old newspapers. and
magazines from homes in the
Valley and sell them for waste
paper.


For free pickup call Sgt. Les
ter 254-4oo0.

Sergeant
Wants Paper
To Buy Shoes

TAMPA, Fla (NPD Mrs.
Henri Lee Hurley, 2l-year-old
mother of four small children
was hospitalized with bullet
lodged in the base of her skull.
She was wounded during "play-
full" act of her new boy friend,
Harry Mimmenger, %, who fired
an "unloaded'' % caliber pis-
tol at her.


According to a police report
the pair was riding in Mimmen-

Mother Of -Four
Shot BY Boy Friend

Nine young men known as the
Hustlers Car Club are sponsor
ing a pig rattle. One half pig
processed and wrapped will be
the lucky ticket holders prize.
The drawing will be held Sat-,
Aug. IS.


Tickets may be purchased from
Oviron Freeman, Billy ]. Woods,
Joe Allen, Jesse Scott, John An
derson, Ona Woods, Ernest Aus
tin, Freddie King and Willie Ross.


Proceeds will be used to enter
racing contests in the Valley and
the Southwest.

Dear Editors:


Please accept our sincere
thanks for your wonderful CO.
operation extended us during our
recent Pacific States ASS ISOLATION
of Elks Conventio on. The coverage
was terrific.

Grand Canyon Temple #437
Mrs. Charlesetta McClammy,

gers car. They stopped to talk,
and Mimmenger pulled the gun
from the glove compartment,
pointed 1t at Mrs. Hurleys head
and pulled the trigger. The
woman said Mimmenger had told
her che had unloaded it."


Mimmenger was arrested on
charge of assault with intent to
kill, but was later released when
Mrs. Hurley refused to press
charges.

Marriage repeated Friday, Aug. Souhminster
Presbyterian Church by DR.. and Mrs. Rowel Ashford.


Miss acquelne Frances Smith, 1864
graduate of Arizona State University.


groom captain stationed Luke Air Force Base The
couple will reside in Glendale.

Price, Mrs. Ashford Dr. Ashford
